titleStmt.title: An account of the late revolutions in New-England in a letter.
titleStmt.author: A. B.
Byfield, Nathanael, 1653-1733, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 7: Your servant, A.B. Boston, June 6. 1689. Attributed to Nathaniel Byfield by Evans. "Authorship doubtful."--Shipton & Mooney.
Imprint supplied from Evans. Wing suggests Benjamin Harris as publisher.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
